UserDao.UPDATE_SQL: UPDATE t_user SET pwd = ?,status = ? WHERE id = ?

PatientDao.QUERY_SQL: SELECT * FROM t_patient ORDER BY id
PatientDao.QUERY_BY_ID_SQL: SELECT * FROM t_patient WHERE id = ? ORDER BY id

CaseDao.SELECT_CASE_AND_PATINT_TABLE_SQL: SELECT c.id cid,examination_time,main_symptom,now_symptom,past_symptom,personal_symptom,body_test, lab_test,examination,advice,other_explain,p.id pid,name,sex,age,married,job,weight,blood,phone_number,register_time, address,allergy,handling_sug,remark FROM t_case c JOIN t_patient p ON patient_id = p.id
CaseDao.QUERY_MIN_EMPTY_ID_SQL1: SELECT minid FROM (SELECT id,ROWNUM minid FROM t_case ORDER BY id) WHERE minid != id AND ROWNUM = 1

MedicineDao.SELECT_MEDICINE_AND_TYPE_TABLE_SQL: SELECT m.id mid,m.name mname,norms,unit,price,uasge,needing_attention,t.id tid,t.name tname,parent_id FROM t_medicine m JOIN t_medicine_type t ON medicine_type_id = t.id
MedicineDao.QUERY_BY_TYPE_ID_SQL: WHERE medicine_type_id = ANY (SELECT id FROM t_medicine_type START WITH id = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR id = parent_id) ORDER BY mid
MedicineDao.QUERY_BY_SEARCH_SQL: WHERE m.id LIKE ? OR m.name LIKE ? OR m.price LIKE ? OR t.name LIKE ? ORDER BY mid
MedicineDao.QUERY_MIN_EMPTY_ID_SQL1: SELECT minid FROM (SELECT id,ROWNUM minid FROM t_medicine ORDER BY id) WHERE minid != id AND ROWNUM = 1

MedicineTypeDao.QUERY_SQL: SELECT c.id cid,c.name cname,p.id pid FROM t_medicine_type c LEFT OUTER JOIN t_medicine_type p ON c.parent_id = p.id
MedicineTypeDao.QUERY_MIN_EMPTY_ID_SQL1: SELECT minid FROM (SELECT id,ROWNUM+99 minid FROM t_medicine_type ORDER BY id) WHERE minid != id AND ROWNUM = 1
MedicineTypeDao.QUERY_BY_NO_CHILD_ID_SQL: SELECT id cid,name cname,parent_id pid FROM t_medicine_type WHERE id != ALL (SELECT NVL(parent_id,0) FROM t_medicine_type)
